last_episode_to_air.name: Part 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Donovan turns himself over to the aliens in order to save his son. Diana hears her colleagues are plotting against her.

name: V: The Final Battle
overview: Is there life out there? Finally we know. Beause they are there. Alien spacecraft with humanlike passengers have come to Earth. They say they come in peace for food and water. The water they find in our reservoirs. The food they find walking about everywhere on two legs.

seasons.name: Miniseries
seasons.overview: Four months have passed since the Visitors first arrived on Earth. They manipulate world opinion in their favor and are determined to eradicate the resistance

episodes.name: Part 1
episodes.overview: Four months have passed since the Visitors first arrived on Earth. They manipulate world opinion in their favor and are determined to eradicate the resistance.

episodes.name: Part 2
episodes.overview: Donovan is reunited with his son and joins the international Resistance headed by Ham Tyler and Chris Farber.

episodes.name: Part 3
episodes.overview: Donovan turns himself over to the aliens in order to save his son. Diana hears her colleagues are plotting against her.
